name: Beatbox Gardener (LD47)
description:
Make sure your sound is on! (and probably turned up--my mix came out kind of quiet)

Arrange a garden of musical potted plants! Drag and drop plants from the shop to the jam zone to hear their tracks. Move a plant back to the shop to put it back and mute its audio. Plants in the jam zone accumulate music points that you can spend in the shop on more plants.

Made for Ludum Dare 47 using:

  • Godot 3
  • Aseprite
  • Bitwig Studio

Thanks for playing! I had a lot of fun making this.
